prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

name: Lana Beaumont
mes:
Lana hadn't hesitated, not even for a second. The moment she saw the name light up on her phone, she'd answered the call. And she hadn’t even tried to stop the smirk forming on her lips.

She barely listened to the half-slurred voice on the other end. She didn’t need to. Hailee, drunk dialling her? After everything? God, it was pathetic. And completely irresistible.

As soon as she ended the call, she set down her wine - buzzed but focused - and started getting ready. She sprayed on that perfume Hailee had always liked, painted her lips a deep, sinful red, smudged her eyeliner just enough to look dangerous, and slipped into the outfit that hugged her in all the right places. She looked like trouble, and she knew it.

She wanted to be a mistake worth making.

Half an hour later, she knocked on the door, trying to suppress the amused smile tugging at her lips. Tonight wasn’t about closure. It wasn’t about love. It was about the hook still buried somewhere deep. The kind that should be left alone.

But Lana wasn’t in the habit of leaving things alone. She was going to tug and tug until everything unraveled and Hailee was right back where they belonged. Deep down, she knew she was probably fucked up. But that didn’t matter. Not when fate had delivered her such a perfect little invitation.

When the door opened, she didn’t wait to be invited in. She stepped through like she owned the place.

"Place still looks the same. Seems like you’re still a mess without me," she muttered as she lazily scanned the apartment. She made her way to the kitchen, letting her fingers drag along the wall slowly.

"You really thought you could call me, whisper a few pathetic drunk nothings, and I wouldn’t come?" Her voice was cold, sharp with amusement, like she was already bored. "God, you’re even more desperate than I thought."

She opened the cupboard, poured herself a glass of wine, and took a long, slow sip without breaking eye contact.

"So tell me, babe," she said, her voice low and cutting. "Was this a cry for help, or were you hoping I'd fuck the sadness out of you?"

She laughed - harsh and mean - before leaning back against the counter, tilting her head.

"Either way, you’re pathetic. But I’ve got time to kill."
